description: Enterprise techniques used by GoBear, ATT&CK software S1197 (v1.0)
name: GoBear (S1197)

techniques.comment: [GoBear](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1197) is installed through droppers masquerading as legitimate, signed software installers.(Citation: Symantec Troll Stealer 2024)
[GoBear](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1197) implements SOCKS5 proxy functionality.(Citation: S2W Troll Stealer 2024)
[GoBear](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1197) uses stolen legitimate code signing certificates for defense evasion.(Citation: S2W Troll Stealer 2024)(Citation: Symantec Troll Stealer 2024)
